comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Oh so prescient abt the temps. RL (not Widman) and I were heat-treated on the climb, but the descent was the berries. Nice ride!

comments.author: Scott
comments.body: You had to wait until I left town for another Frenzy, eh? SB

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: There was NO WAY I was going to let the Bailey clan hammer me into a fine paste in Left Hand Canyon. I have to deal with one Bailey on a routine basis, and, subsequently, my ego feels as if it's been downsized and outsourced. Two Baileys? Yikes! Kidding of course, SB2; I hope next time you're in town we get to ride together. I'd enjoy that!
